Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.21520894] No hemolytic activity was observed for Xb-KTI. The peptide induced a hemolysis of 12% at the highest concentration of 250 μg/mL. Values(OD540) were normalized against 100% lysed erythrocytes (0.1% Triton X-100) and PDB (untreated control)
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Serine protease inhibitor. Displays antimicrobial activity against the Gram-negative bacterium S. typhimurium ATCC 14028. Displays a weak hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: A Kunitz proteinase inhibitor from corms of Xanthosoma blandum with bactericidal activity.
Literature.Author: Lima TB, Silva ON, Migliolo L, Souza-Filho CR, Gonçalves EG, Vasconcelos IM, Oliveira JT, Amaral AC, Franco OL.
